To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private LogReturn _logr;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_logr = LOGR(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_logr.IsReady)
{
    var period = _logr.Period.Value;
    var current = _logr.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.logr = self.LOGR(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.logr.IsReady:
    period = self.logr.Period.Value
    current = self.logr.Current.Value
